texts.Volo.Account:InvalidEmailAddress: Can not find the given email address:{0}
texts.Volo.Account:ImpersonateTenantOnlyAvaila: Impersonate tenant only available for host!
texts.Volo.Account:ThereIsNoUserWithUserName: There is no user with username: {UserName}!
texts.Volo.Account:ThereIsNoUserWithId: There is no user with id:{UserId}!
texts.PasswordResetInfoInEmail: We received an account recovery request! If you initiated this request, click the following link to reset your password.
texts.EmailConfirmationInfoInEmail: Please confirm your email address by clicking the following link.
texts.UseAnotherServiceToLogin: Use another service to log in
texts.UserLockedOutMessage: Your account has been locked by the admin or due to invalid login attempts. Please try again later. Contact your system administrator if you think this is a mistake.
texts.LoginIsNotAllowed: You are not allowed to login! Your account is inactive or needs to confirm your email/phone number.
texts.SelfRegistrationDisabledMessage: Self user registration is disabled for this application. Contact to the application administrator to register a new user.
texts.VerifySecurityCodeNotLoggedInErrorMessag: You should be login first, in order to verify yourself! Probably, your login has been timeout. Please go to the login page and re-try it.
texts.VerifySecurityCode_Information: Please enter the verification code sent to you.
texts.SendSecurityCode_Information: You should verify yourself to login. Please select a verification type. A code will be sent based on the selected verification type.
texts.SendPasswordResetLink_Information: A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.
texts.PasswordResetMailSentMessage: Account recovery email sent to your e-mail address. If you don't see this email in your inbox within 15 minutes, look for it in your junk mail folder. If you find it there, please mark it as -Not Junk-.
texts.YourEmailAddressIsSuccessfullyConfirmed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed.
texts.PasswordChangedMessage: Your password has been changed successfully.
texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.Description:EnableLocalLogin: Indicates if Server will allow users to authenticate with a local account.
texts.DoYouWantToVerifyPhoneNumberMessage: You've changed your phone number information. Would you like to verify it now?
texts.FirstlySubmitToVerify: Firstly save your new information, then you can verify.
texts.EmailConfirmationSentMessage: A verification link has been sent to your email ({0}).
texts.ConfirmationTokenSentMessage: A verification code has been sent to your phone number.
texts.PhoneConfirmationToken: Please enter the code below to verify your phone number:
texts.PhoneConfirmationSms: Hi {0}! Here is your verification code: {1}
texts.PhoneNumberEmptyHelpText: You don't have a phone number, Verify will set it.
texts.LoggedOutText: You have been signed out and you will be redirected soon.
texts.ReturnToText: Click here to return to the application
texts.MoveCursorOnExamples: Move your cursor on images to see rounded style.
texts.ProfilePictureWillBeChanged: Your profile picture will be changed.
texts.Description:UseGravatar: Use Gravatar service for your profile picture.
texts.UseGravatarConfirm: You will be using Gravatar as your profile picture.
texts.NoProfilePictureConfirm: You will use default avatar as your profile picture.
texts.PPUploadConfirm: You will use your selected image as your profile picture.
texts.DisplayName:UseCaptchaOnLogin: Use security image question (captcha) on login.
texts.Description:UseCaptchaOnLogin: Use security image question (captcha) on login.
texts.DisplayName:UseCaptchaOnRegistration: Use security image question (captcha) on registration.
texts.Description:UseCaptchaOnRegistration: Use security image question (captcha) on registration.
texts.InvalidSiteKeyOrSiteSecret: Invalid site key or site secret
texts.SetNullWillUseGlobalSettings: Leave as empty to use the defaults
texts.DeleteLinkAccountConfirmationMessage: Are you sure to delete the link account '{0}'?
texts.NewLinkAccountWarning: You'll be logged out from the current account and logging in with another account. Once you do it, two accounts will be linked.
texts.TheTargetAccountIsNotLinkedToYou: The target account is not linked to you!
texts.LinkAccountWarning: Please note that you are linking to other accounts, Click here to cancel the link login!
texts.AccessDeniedMessage: You do not have access to this resource.
texts.UncheckThePermissionsYouDoNotWishToGrant: Uncheck the permissions you do not wish to grant.
texts.DeviceAuthorizationSuccessfullyInfo: You have successfully authorized the device
